pages.title: Huainan Mat
pages.text: $(l)Temporal Range:$() Neoproterozoic (Tonian)$(br2)$(l)Habitat:$() Marine$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Shears

Huainan Mat is a freely-represented block based on fossils from the Upper Tonian, found in the Liulaobei Formation, North China. It is based on the 'shelly' Huainan Biota, Sinosabellidites, Pararenicola and Protoarenicola, all of which are several mm in size.
